bridge-type.label: Pentair-RS485 Serial Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge should be configured when using a USB->RS485 interface.

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: The serial port name. Valid values are e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: Pentair ID
parameter.description: The ID to use to send commands on the Pentair bus (default: 34)
